author: CTPPS
body:
Including two horizontal pots with their diamond contents onto ```cms:CMSE```. New data format defining the RecHits for these diamonds.
- DDL files included in ```Geometry/VeryForwardData```
- new ```CTPPSDiamondRecHit``` object parsing all information collected at the ```CTPPSDiamondDigi``` level and associating it to the newfound geometry products for the spatial components
- new ```ctppsDiamondReconstruction``` sequence for the RecHits production (soon to be accompanied by the local tracks fitting procedure)
- new test for the digi + rechit steps (```RecoCTPPS/TotemRPLocal/test/diamonds_reco_cfg.py```)
And, furthermore
- stripping out the ```MeasuredGeometryProducer``` class from ```Geometry/VeryForwardGeometryBuilder/plugins/TotemRPGeometryESModule.cc``` for clarity

Matrix test:
- ```runTheMatrix.py -l limited``` output: ```16 16 15 13 8 1 1 1 tests passed, 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 failed```
title: CTPPS: diamonds geometry and RecHits
